name: Nico Tortorella
description: Nico Tortorella is an American actor and model.
statusText: Speaking to the New York Post's Page Six in June 2016, Tortorella declared himself to be sexually fluid.
subStatusText: In 2016, Tortorella launched his podcast The Love Bomb

name: Ben Barnes
description: Benjamin Thomas Barnes is a British actor and singer.
statusText:
On 20 July 2015 it was announced that Barnes would replace Eion Bailey as Logan in HBO's science fiction thriller Westworld, the first season of which aired in the fall of 2016.

We can save this world.
We can burn it to the ground.
From the ashes, build a new world.
Our world.
subStatusText: In 2016, Barnes was cast in the Marvel Netflix series The Punisher

name: Tom Daley
description: Thomas Robert Daley is a British diver.
statusText: My reaction to othersâ€™ hate, bigotry & misinformation will not include anger or hate. For me, the path forward is lit with curiosity, listening, correcting the record when possible, and as best I can, leading with an example of strength & love.
subStatusText: Daley and Black married at Bovey Castle in Devon on 6 May 2017

name: Jonathan Groff
description: Jonathan Groff is an American actor and singer.
statusText: Make sure that you always follow your heart and your gut, and let yourself be who you want to be, and who you know you are. And don't let anyone steal your joy.
subStatusText: Groff publicly came out as gay in October 2009
